title: I never watch the twilight Movies, should I do it now just for it to be finally over?
body:
I prolonged this piece of shit for years, I dare not read the books, in fear of losing my taste for "good" literature. but I think it's time I finally download these 5 or how many movies, in 1080 ofc.. watch them in a row, and then tell myself "thank god this is over"

should I do this to myself, or would it be ok to die without ever watching the Twilight series?

http://images2.fanpop.com/images/photos/3400000/Edward-and-Bella-Cullen-the-cullens-3490603-450-665.jpg

have I been brain washed by everyone around me, is it really that bad?. worst main character, stupid plot, bad writing.
